description:
While the rest of the student council members start to awaken to their powers, the distortion in the space-time starts to appear. Haruto solves the mystery behind the numbers that appeared from J’s bracelet and explains its meaning to everyone else. It’s then that Holmes and Watson figured out the connection between J and Hayakawa and they head over to Café de Wayne to ask Hayakawa about it in person. Hayakwa tries to dodge their question, but a particular phrase brings him sadness...
Source: crunchyroll
